item.title: Drop Pane : Not Only Match-3
item.description:
About This Game

According to cognitive psychology, searching for targets in space can be categorized into parallel and serial searches. Parallel search, an automated process, can handle multiple targets simultaneously at a constant speed regardless of their numbers. Serial search requires the conscious intervention at a slower but more flexible speed. Through training, some serial search actions can be automated, reducing response time.

For the two different search methods, Drop Pane: Not Only Match-3 is designed with three gameplays: Match-3, Symmetrical Elimination, and Spell Elimination. Each of them consists of 19 levels in which the falling speed of the piece gradually increases. After completing level 9, you can unlock the optional Obstacle Block Mode, which randomly adds obstacle blocks to the playfield each time when you level up. Users can choose starting speed for levels 1 to 9 and starting height of obstacle blocks for levels 1 to 12, and unlock more obstacle block gameplay after completing the corresponding missions.

Color search exemplifies parallel processing. The match-3 mechanics, eliminating the blocks same color, tap into our intuitive understanding of color and enable the attention to concentrate on the arrangement of colored blocks. As a results, more pleasurable experience is obtained through continuous elimination.

Symmetric patterns gameplay requires to more conscious intervention. Symmetry is aligned with our aesthetic preferences, but identifying symmetrical targets is not an automatic process. Confirming symmetrical patterns' existence and guiding falling blocks to suitable positions require the storage and processing of substantial information in short-term memory. Successfully tackling this challenge demonstrates the competence in those professions demanding broad attentions, such as programming.

Beyond short-term memory usage, spell elimination gameplay involves extracting spelling information from long-term memory. Vocabulary, extraction speed, and attention span collectively influence on game performance, making it a gameplay style that demands on high intellectual comprehensive qualities.

The game's three modes form a progression from automated processing to complete conscious intervention. By continuous, incremental challenges completion, some serial processing tasks can be automated. As game performance improves, attention span and vocabulary extraction ability can be sustained and enhanced.

Please give your valuable comments on the game, I will always listen and improve the game, especially the spell elimination part. Since English is not my native language, it's hard for me to judge whether the difficulty is suitable for native users. My e-mail address is LarkDream@163.com, Please let me hear your suggestions, thanks!

Wishing you an enjoyable gaming experience and benefitting from the game!

item.title: Anomaly Agent
item.description:
About This Game



Become Agent 70 and stop the anomalies threatening to destroy the balance of the world!

  • Use extraordinary anomaly weapons to toss your opponents around! Overcome your enemies using melee techniques or deadly firearms!

  • Modify your gameplay by upgrading your character in different ways.

  • Escape your pursuers with acrobatic moves.

  • Shape how the story unfolds. Unravel the mysteries you face and make the world a safer place... or plunge it into disaster.

With memorable characters, unique Anomaly Bosses, a story full of twists, and smooth gameplay, Anomaly Agent is an adventure to be savored. We hope you enjoy your journey!

item.title: AlchePot
item.description:
About This Game

A fantastic but difficult Bullet Hell.

- Bullet Absorb -
You can absorb enemy bullets by stop firing, for each bullet you absorbed, energy points will be got.
Note that some of the bullets are too hard to be absorbed.

- Energy System -
Your attack is enhanced with energy gauge. Once you use it up, get it by killing enemies and absorbing bullets.

- Multiple abilities -
Player abilities will be unlocked throughout levels. For each wave of yellow-marked enemies you killed, your experience gets refreshed.

item.title: Saga of the Moon Priestess
item.description:
About This Game

Explore a mystical world in classic top-down style and save the kidnapped prince!



Tragedy strikes the world of Lunaria as the illustrious prince is kidnapped by an unknown assailant! The well-being of the land itself now rests in the hands of a young hero, Sarissa, as she has to fight, explore and figure out how to rescue the young prince. Armed with nothing but her trusty spear and the miraculous ability to communicate with the Goddess of the Moon, she must overcome treacherous enemies and dark dungeons.

Saga of the Moon Priestess is a retro top-down action-adventure inspired by 8-bit and 16-bit classics. Featuring crisp pixel art and original sounds and music, Saga of the Moon Priestess invokes a simpler era of the action-adventure genre. With 5 dungeons to explore, 7 life containers, 15 items to collect and countless enemies to defeat, the world of Lunaria is a land lush with things to do, secrets to find and people to talk to.



Features:

  • Embark on an old-school action adventure through the world of Lunaria!
  • Guide a young hero named Sarissa as she searches for a kidnapped prince.
  • Wield a spear and fight to gain new abilities as you explore forests, grasslands, dungeons and more!
  • Manage gear, collect health upgrades and discover useful tools.
  • Pick up rocks as improvised weapons and use other parts of the environment to your advantage!

item.title: Picker Bot 42
item.description:
About This Game

Explore, discover items, find Wassie lore, upgrade PB42 to gloriously defeat mutant plants and fly back home

PB42


Your peaceful work assignment goes wrong as your navigation system gets damaged by some pesky space debris. Luckily, the picker bot spaceships have one backup route to the Merchant Bay, a big trade hub. After the emergency landing on a seemingly lifeless planet, PB42 discovers that it is full of artifacts from its former inhabitants. A perfect job for a picker bot. But the sound sensors detect some rustle from beneath. Something is lurkingâ€¦

Upgrade to return home


Platform you way through the underground rift, which changes every time you enter. But listen carefully, as something is lurking in the dark and you as a picker bot are not equipped for those encounters yet. Find and pick up various collectibles, check their values and drop what's worth less, but such precious artifacts will always sell well at the Merchant Bay.
The Merchant Bay offers scrap parts from different types of bots. If you have credits, of course. Thrusters, blasters, homing missiles, illumination, extra durability, you name it. And whatâ€™s that over there in the back, behind the gruesome Merchant Wassie? A shiny new navigation system to replace your damaged one? How in the universe can an ordinary picker bot afford it though...
Splurge on a blaster and you want regret it, as those angry mutant plants hold lots of extraordinary artifcats and guard chests with even more valuable loot. And completing the item sets can definitely be lucrative.
Upgrade PB42 into a formidable machine to finally navigate back home.

item.title: Strayï¼šExotic
item.description:
About This Game

Just as you are about to fall asleep, someone knocks on your door and leaves an invitation to participate in a mysterious trial. And you "volunteered" to participate in the experiment. There are only two things you need to do, and that is to survive and escape.

This is a horror puzzle game, this game doesn't have to jump kill, you have to solve simple puzzles, you have to find the differences in the room, you have to hide from unknown monsters in the dark and escape from here. Even if it looks safe, it's not necessarily safe, so try to survive.

The game currently has 5 levels (with more to come)

item.title: Aviators
item.description:
About This Game

DISCOVER THE HISTORY OF POLISH AIR FORCES DURING WORLD WAR II

Take role of a Polish aviation ace from World War II and engage in aerial battles with the Luftwaffe! Learn the story of the legendary Polish 1586 Special Destiny Squadron. Rush to help the Warsaw Uprising by participating in the reconstruction of the night flight on August 16-17, 1944.

"Aviators" is an educational adventure game in first-person mode, incorporating skill elements and logical riddles. The storyline is based on real events and characters of Polish aviators serving in the air during World War II. Explore the journal module containing a compendium of historical knowledge referenced in "Aviators."

The game for Windows PC is available in Polish, English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Ukrainian, Russian, Uzbek, and Polish and American Sign Language.

DISCOVER THE LEGENDS OF POLISH AVIATION, JOIN IN AERIAL BATTLES

The game is divided into 6 missions featuring authentic characters from World War II, including Jan Zumbach, StanisÅ‚aw Skalski, Anna Leska, Jadwiga PiÅ‚sudska, Leszek Owsiany, WÅ‚odzimierz Bernhardt. Learn about their fates and participate in their incredible missions. Repel the attacks of the German air force, operate devices on board the Halifax MK, communicate with the local partisan unit â€Armia Krajowaâ€, and assist the Warsaw Uprising! Break through the German A2 fortifications, destroy 88 mm artillery positions, and complete the mission with a car escape

Feel the Magic Of the Game's Soundtrack

"The Aviators' Suite" is an intricate series of compositions inspired by the genius of Karol Szymanowski and MieczysÅ‚aw KarÅ‚owicz, composed by PrzemysÅ‚aw Treszczotka. The entire suite makes up an immersive project that will captivate not only aviation enthusiasts!

item.title: Aviators VR
item.description:
About This Game

DISCOVER THE HISTORY OF POLISH AIR FORCES DURING WORLD WAR II

Take role of a Polish aviation ace from World War II and engage in aerial battles with the Luftwaffe! Learn the story of the legendary Polish 1586 Special Destiny Squadron. Rush to help the Warsaw Uprising by participating in the reconstruction of the night flight on August 16-17, 1944.

item.title: Escape The Aquarium
item.description:
About This Game

This is a world fabricated by mysterious creatures
Explore the box court level and find the corresponding puzzle solving items
Escape this strange place before exhaustion!


But be careful of the invisible countdown



If you are injured, you need to replenish your supplies in a timely manner


A slightly retro style
The double ending of "not wasting too much of your time"

item.title: Toribash Next
item.description:
About This Game

THE NEXT GREAT FIGHTING GAME

Toribash Next is the sequel to Toribash, the award-winning turn-based sandbox fighting game. Toribash revolutionized the genre by allowing players to create their own moves during a match, using easy-to-understand 3D physics tools. Toribash Next takes fighting games to the next level with weapons, four-player battles and a new replay editor, plus more of the customization and modding options that made the original game a fan favorite.

WHERE WILL YOU STRIKE NEXT?

Challenge your friends to a bloody four-player free-for-all, or team up for freestyle tricking and parkour exhibitions. Change the rules, spawn items and even alter the environment right in the middle of a match. Create epic martial-arts replays by editing in new moves after the fact. Toribash Next gives you the freedom to make the moves youâ€™ve dreamed of making... and play the way youâ€™ve dreamed of playing!

FEATURES

â€¢ Innovative turn-based gameplay with 3D body movement and
physics
â€¢ 20 different articulation points that can be manipulated in each
turn (21 with weapons)
â€¢ Game modes include Classic, Samurai Fight, Aikido and Gun
Duel
â€¢ All-new 3- and 4-player modes, including team fights and freefor-all
â€¢ Equippable weapons including guns, swords and staves
â€¢ New Replay Editor lets you return to any point in a completed
fight and change the outcome
â€¢ Wide variety of character, environment and rule customizations
â€¢ In-game economy: Buy and sell custom characters and mods
â€¢ Player-hosted servers

item.title: Watch The Fish
item.description:
About This Game

Keep the fish water in jar as long as possible ! Watch The Fish is an arcade game where you have to show your dexterity to manage the fish water and get the best possible score. Choose to turn the wheel of fortune at your own risk.

Features

  • Fishes
  • World leaderboard of goldfish lovers
  • Stats and achievements
  • Constantly increasing entropy controlled by an invisible force
  • Chill and annoying songs
  • Many fishes
  • Weather events
  • Different endings to unlock
  • Coins, diamonds and many many fishes !

For Steam Deck players

For a unique gaming experience, the fishjar angle can be controlled by the console gyroscope. Please make a try.
Enable it in Steam Input by selecting a "Gamepad with Gyro" profile.
The gyro should act as the right joystick and always be activated (check the Gyro settings).

item.title: Dracula Awakens
item.description:
About This Game

Dracula Awakens is a short horror game about Dracula's return to this world.

A world where you desperately need to keep your job. And to do so, you offer to get evidence about the disappearance of a man in Dracula's castle, which was a tourist attraction before the incident.

Since the police didn't care about the immigrant man, you will find out what happened to him.

Welcome to Dracula's Castle




Here you will find:

  • An ancient vampire lord with his wife chasing you
  • Retro style low poly graphics
  • Unique puzzles
  • A castle and catacombs to explore
  • Bats and ghosts to use your super flash camera
  • Multiple endings
  • Manual save in the save room (no newbie-friendly autosave)

Gameplay




Simple and effective as it looks: A camera with a super flash ready to aim and shoot, enemies and your limited medicine to heal if you are surprised from behind.

The Castle


Solve unique puzzles and explore the castle while surviving.



Please note: This game is an experience that can be completed in under 2 hours and is aimed at players who enjoy old school survival horror games.

item.title: The Witch's Cauldron
item.description:
About This Game


ABOUT THIS GAME

The Witch's Cauldron is a narrative roguelike game about... guess what?.. being a witch.

You are a witch living on the outskirts of a small medieval town with her cat. Potions are your tools of choice. With your cauldron you brew your way through the world. But you've got to keep your balance. On one side of the scales is the terror you bring. On the other - your fame among the people. If the scales are tipped too much, someone will definitely come for your life. But it doesn't really matter, for your soul was lost long ago. And the cycle will continue.

While the shadow of the inquisition is yet far away, peasants, townsfolk and even the king himself are coming to pay their respects to you. Listen to their problems, learn their mysteries, unlock new recipes, and keep in mind that your benevolent or malevolent intentions will surely make a difference.

Branching narrative.

Meet a cast of weird petitioners with their incessant requests. Help them or follow your own agenda. Uncover secrets, play with people's fates or just make the cows sing. Potions you choose to brew for your visitors influence future events.

Potion discovery.

You begin knowing only a couple of basic recipes, but by experimenting with mixes you can unlock new ones. Not every problem can be solved with rat poison (but nothing stops you from trying). And no matter what gruesome end you've met in your last cycle, you get to keep all unlocked recipes. If you hit a block in your research, you can always ask for help, but are you ready to pay the price?

Keep the balance.

Don't let fame or fear get to your head. And remember: peasants have pitchforks and there's a lot of them.

Plethora of endings.

The multitude of potions and plot twists ensure high replayability. Some recipes, game mechanics and endings become unlocked only when certain conditions are fulfilled (like beating the main story or getting some game-ending events).

A cat.

You have one and you can pet him.

item.title: Chef Chen
item.description:
About This Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1335360


"Chef Chen" is a multiplayer cooperative hunting and cooking game designed for 1 to 4 players. Chef Chen and his companions own a restaurant that is facing severe financial constraints. To quickly earn a significant income, they must participate in high-risk cooking competitions. As part of Chef Chen's skilled cooking team, you and your fellow players embark on an adventurous journey in a fantastical world of culinary challenges.

Chef Chen, who uses insulated gloves as boxing gloves; Parsley, the Samurai Shiba Inu who believes two swords are never enough; Bay, the archer with unparalleled accuracy shooting arrows with their feet; and the innocent-looking yet fiercely formidable magician cat Pepper. Together, the four of you venture into a different world to face exciting challenges!

Being a qualified chef requires more than just chopping meat and stir-frying!

During the competition, you must gather ingredients on the spot, from stealing Harpy's Egg, slicing Red Scallion, peeling Aethercap, to hunting Cockatrice. Each ingredient must be obtained through your own efforts, and completing orders within the time limit earns you rewarding stars!

Teamwork is everything!

If you think that everyone simply needs to excel at their own tasks to easily win the competition, you are mistaken! In addition to wandering monsters and various obstacles, the fantasy world is filled with hurdles and mechanisms. With limited cooking knives, magic vines, trebuchets, floor mechanisms, and seesaws, your success depends on the level of cooperation and synchronization with your teammates!

Mysterious colossal mythical creatures!

While you are focused on hunting monsters and collecting ingredients, mythical creatures that extend beyond the boundaries of stories emerge from the depths of the fantasy world, adding an extra level of excitement and challenge to your already bustling competition!

Adventure with new partners!

Whether you prefer to take on the challenge alone or gather friends and family to form a team, you will encounter exhilarating challenges in a variety of levels. Unlocking new stages and locations, and if your culinary skills are exceptional, you may even recruit new chef companions to join your team, adding more creativity and strategy to your upcoming levels!

Each partner must play their role, collaborate, and serve one delicious dish after another, conquering the discerning taste buds of the judges and earning applause and rewards!

item.title: æ— ç•èˆ°é˜Ÿï¼šç‚®ç«æˆ˜äº‰ï¼ˆNoah City:Rise of the conquerorï¼‰
item.description:
About This Game

In the year 2065, the world is in chaos. Climate change has caused sea levels to rise, flooding coastal cities and displacing millions of people. The old world order has collapsed, and three powerful factions have emerged to vie for control of the planet, each with a different vision for the new world.

Gone are the days of conventional warfare; now, cutting-edge war machines like futuristic aircraft carriers, stealthy submarines, and powerful destroyers take center stage. Human technology advances at an unprecedented pace, resulting in the creation of the ultimate war machine: the AI Scourge Legion.

However, the relentless evolution of AI technology endows the Scourge Legion with autonomous consciousness, prompting it to seek control over Earth. Each of the three factions believes that they can defeat the AI Scourge Legion and become the new rulers of the planet. As a skilled military commander, players must choose a faction, lead its development, strive to unite the world under their banner, and ultimately become the master of the new world!



â˜…Precise restoration of legendary warshipsâ˜…

Over 150 legendary warships, submarines and aircraft carriers are restored precisely in the game, enabling players to build a loyal naval fleet.



â˜…Classic styles of sea wars! Just sink all the enemy warshipsâ˜…

Aim for the ocean! Feel the excitement and the glory in the warship battles while you are conquering the world!



â˜…Diverse warship gears for you to DIY to handle all kinds of battlefieldâ˜…

Automatic artillery, anti-aircraft guns, armor, radar, propulsion devices and other gears can all be freely constructed by yourself. How to survive in the dangerous battlefield? It all depends on you, the commander!



â˜…Dominate the vast sea area with Air and Sea armiesâ˜…

Build a fighter workshop to load carrier-exclusive fighter jets. Milanese and Raptor fighter jets are always at your service.



â˜…Only the strong ones can survive in the storm-like warsâ˜…

There are still many more commanders with superior wisdom and strength among three allied countries. Who can be the best of them to unify the three forces?



â˜…Be the leader of the battlefield by the cross-generation high technologyâ˜…

Storing up energy and working on future technologies will give you a chance to win from the start and bring higher battle effectiveness to your warships!

item.title: Summon Masters
item.description:
About This Game

This is a card and board game with the following features:

Deck Building: Players can build their own decks to battle with. Depending on different strategies and opponents, players can choose different cards to counter.

Tactical Gameplay: The game uses a 3x10 chessboard, and players can freely place cards to fight. Players need to develop tactics and arrange card positions and usage order within limited space.

Different Professions: Players can choose freely from four professions - swordsman, mage, monk, and archer. Each profession has different characteristics and skills, and players can choose according to their preferences and tactical needs.

Competitive Battles: Players can battle with other players after building their decks, and it is fun to fight with other people. Through battles with other players, players can improve their strength and tactical skills.

Team Dungeons: In addition to fighting against other players, players can also team up with others to challenge high-difficulty dungeons. Players need to defeat powerful bosses through cooperation and strategy to get more rewards and cards.

Special Challenges: Players can participate in special rules challenges and use their intelligence to defeat other players. These special rules make the game more interesting and challenging, and players need to constantly think and try new strategies.

Fast-paced: Each game is fast-paced (within 5 minutes), and can be played in short fragments of time. The fast pace of the game allows players to enjoy the game in a short time, while also being able to play at any time and anywhere.

item.title: Ball is Life
item.description:
About This Game



Ball's a well-rounded fellow, but he soon finds himself in an existential crisis. Take Ball on a challenging and hilarious adventure as he jumps across the globe, scouring the round world for round friends who can help him live his best life. He's a small guy with big dreams, and while he can't bounce, he makes up for it with a can-do attitude and a really cool hat! His intentions are noble, but he soon finds out that not everyone supports his bravery.




Jump, swerve, and jump again through a series of simple but tricky stages that will truly test your aim, control, and perception. Will you and Ball take the journey on 'Normal' mode for a fun challenge, or are you both willing to risk it for the biscuit with 'Baller' mode's aggressive timer and faster platforms?




A charming, silly, yet thoughtful cast of characters awaits you each step of your journey.



Bounce to the beat of a groovy hip-hop and lo-fi soundtrack while you and Ball seek out new friends for guidance (but mostly shenanigans).

Features

- Over 10 stages of precise 3D platforming.
- Charming dialogue with a crisp UI and vibey backgrounds.
- Time records: Challenge your friends or aim to be the best in the world!
- Balls!

item.title: Saiko no sutoka no shiki
item.description:
About This Game

Saiko No Sutoka No Shiki is a spin-off of the original game, Saiko No Sutoka. Itâ€™s a survival based on a horror game where you must escape from AI that activily hunts you down in unique ways.


KEY FEATURES

There are 3 new AI with different behaviours that can hunt our player in unique ways using trees to hide and stalk there prey below:

YUI (The Antagonist)

She is a new girl introduced in this spin off version and hostile to player; she attacks with scissors and can hide behind the tree to ambush you. She likes to throw some insults at you to lower your moral, then harrasses and kills Saiko. You must stop her in order to escape since she holds the key to the exit gate of the game.

SAIKO (The Zombie)

Saiko Chan came from the previous game Saiko No Sutoka, but this time she has turned into an undead. You need to get her help to defeat Yui, so that you can escape the game.
In order to defeat Yui, you might need to make sure Saiko becoming stronger and complete all her parts, then she can help you defeat Yui. Be aware! She can also get hungry and demand you to find her food or she might end up eating you instead.

ELISSU (The Yangire)

She was introduced as an easter in the previouse game, but in this mode she has her own dedicated mode; her AI is revamped to fit the new forest map. She has 3 phases in her complicated AI below:

Stalking Mode

This phase works when she stalks actively; she doesnâ€™t reveal her self or attacks. She will give you some hints by giggling, but you wonâ€™t know where its coming from until its too late.

Playful Mode

In this phase, she will attempt to get close to the player and shove the player around such as attemps to do combat with player and might harrass the player, but she wonâ€™t kill you; she likes to make sure the player doesnâ€™t reach the escape point.

Kill Mode

Be careful! In this phase, she will use any method to end the player and might resort to use many of her ways to finish the player without any hessitation.



Combat system player can use melee weapon to fend off against other enemies and tries to survive with fully block mechanic to block attacks inflicted by the enemies.

Randomly generated forest map with 3 variations that the player might have a hard time navigating around. AI will use some trees to stalk and hunt the player including climing the tree and using the bushes to hide and stalk.

Multiple endings of the game contains of 4 endings in total. They would be connected with each other in order to give a final conclusion. If all endings are finished, so multiple playthrough is a must in order to fully grasp the meaning of this spin off.
